mapper.insert: INSERT INTO purchase_order ( order_id, branch, requester_id, requester_name, status, registered_date, last_modified, modified_by ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{branch}, #{requesterId}, #{requesterName}, IFNULL(#{status}, '미승인'), NOW(), NULL, NULL -- last_modified를 NULL로 설정 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM purchase_order ORDER BY registered_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE purchase_order SET branch = #{branch}, requester_id = #{requesterId}, requester_name = #{requesterName}, status = #{status}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy}, modified_date = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
